title: Top Digital Marketing Agency | WSI Comandix
description: WSI is a digital marketing agency servicing Canada since 1999. We help clients in Markham and Toronto improve their online presence through SEO, PPC, Web design, and more.
text_content:
Top Digital Marketing Agency | WSI Comandix
Google Premier Partner
As a Google Premier Partner, WSI holds a significant rank in the Google Partner Program. This means that Google acknowledges WSI as an AdWords certified partner and approves that we qualify for Google's highest standards and quality criteria. In order to qualify as a Partner, an agency must continuously meet Google's requirements in three areas: certification, ad spend, and performance. Being a Partner means WSI is knowledgeable, experienced, and successful at Paid Search. In other words, we know how to optimize a campaign so it makes you money. It also means that we have a great relationship with Google and direct access to their representatives. We get to hear about the new or upcoming Google features and as a Partner, we get access to advanced training and support, which our clients directly benefit from.
markdown_content:
# Top Digital Marketing Agency | WSI Comandix

### Google Premier Partner

As a Google Premier Partner, WSI holds a significant rank in the Google Partner Program. This means that Google acknowledges WSI as an AdWords certified partner and approves that we qualify for Google's highest standards and quality criteria. In order to qualify as a Partner, an agency must continuously meet Google's requirements in three areas: certification, ad spend, and performance. Being a Partner means WSI is knowledgeable, experienced, and successful at Paid Search. In other words, we know how to optimize a campaign so it makes you money. It also means that we have a great relationship with Google and direct access to their representatives. We get to hear about the new or upcoming Google features and as a Partner, we get access to advanced training and support, which our clients directly benefit from.

Create tailored content that resonates with your audience and drives engagement.
We live in an age where online media reigns supreme.
85.5 billion visits: Google.com achieved this remarkable number in March 2024.
5 trillion searches: By March 2025, Google revealed an incredible 5 trillion searches annually.
These impressive figures underline the dominance of online platforms, reshaping how we access and share information in today's connected world.

At Ignite Digital, we leverage this wealth of data and advanced tools to:

Ensure your message connects at the right time
This targeted approach from our digital marketing company ensures your product or service stands out and reaches the people who matter most.

AI Powered Digital Marketing and Growth Agency
Your Digital Marketing Growth Partner for the AI Era 
Scalable Strategies. Intelligent Automation. Marketing That Drives Results. 
MacRAE'S partners with businesses across North America to deliver AI-enabled digital marketing solutions focused on measurable growth and long-term success. From mid-sized companies to large enterprises, we help you outperform competitors—not just keep up. 
100+
